description:
Blake has this macho, take-no-shit attitude off camera. He's one of those straight guys who lays back in the chair and says "whatever" and "dude" a lot. When I approached him about getting head from another guy, I knew what kind of reaction I would get. His primary goal was to make sure that I knew he is straight.
Dale is a fan of the website and he's easily one of the best cocksuckers I've come across. Once I introduced him to Blake and the lights turned on, he nervously reached over to touch Blake. Then, before I knew it, they were both naked and Blake was shoving his cock down Dale's throat — and Dale loved every minute of it!
title: Blake & Dale
